abstract: Smithsonian Institution says it may open new 40,000-square-foot exhibition space in London in 2021; gallery, if built, would be institution's first-ever permanent exhibition space outside United States.
lead_paragraph: The Smithsonian Institution has announced that it is considering a new 40,000-square-foot exhibition space in London, to open in 2021.
snippet: The Smithsonian Institution has announced that it is considering a new 40,000-square-foot exhibition space in London, to open in 2021.
